Adjective: equal in degree or extent or amount; or equally matched or balanced
being level or straight or regular and without variation as e.g. in shape or texture; or being in the same plane or at the same height as something else (i.e. even wit)
of the score in a contest
Adverb: used as an intensive especially to indicate something unexpected
to a greater degree or extent; used with comparisons
Noun: the latter part of the day (the period of decreasing daylight from late afternoon until nightfal)
